MK_Info_PowerAllot.sql: SELECT pt.ID AS ID,pr.PowerName AS PowerName,pr.Notes AS Notes,pr.MenuAddress AS MenuAddress,pt.CreateUser AS CreateUser,pt.CreateDate AS CreateDate,pt.ShowMark AS ShowMark,pt.Status AS Status FROM MK_Info_PowerAllot AS pt JOIN dbo.MK_Info_PowerGroup AS pp ON pt.PowerGroupID=pp.ID AND pp.ShowMark='Y' JOIN dbo.MK_Type_Power AS pr ON pt.PowerID=pr.ID AND pr.ShowMark='Y' WHERE pt.PowerGroupID=@PowerGroupID AND pt.ShowMark='Y'
